question: You need to design a solution for global load balancing based on the URL path being requested. You need to ensure operations reliability and end-to-end in- transit encryption based on Google best practices. What should you do?

options.text: Create a cross-region load balancer with URL Maps.
Create an HTTPS load balancer with URL Maps.
Create appropriate instance groups and instances. Configure SSL proxy load balancing.
Create a global forwarding rule. Configure SSL proxy load balancing.
